name: fat_mat_sel.py
author: AFNI Team
description: Perform simple matrix plotting operations from outputs of FATCAT programs 3dNetCorr and 3dTrackID.

inputs.description: Supply names of parameters, separated by whitespace, for selecting from a matrix file
inputs.name: Parameters

inputs.description: Provide the set of matrix (*.grid or *.netcc) files by searchable path. This can be a globbable entry in quotes containing wildcard characters.
inputs.name: Matrix Input

inputs.description: Provide the matrix (*.grid or *.netcc) files by explicit path, matched per file with a CSV subject ID.
inputs.name: List Match

inputs.description: Output individual matrix files of properties.
inputs.name: Output Individual Matrix

inputs.description: Output as a 1D dset, more easily readable by other programs.
inputs.name: Output Individual 1D Dset

inputs.description: Switch to hold the Python-produced image on the output screen until a key has been hit.
inputs.name: Hold Image

inputs.description: Switch to turn off the usage of user-defined labels in the *.grid/*.netcc files.
inputs.name: External Labels No

inputs.description: Select image format type (e.g., jpg, png, pdf).
inputs.name: File Type

inputs.description: Set resolution (dots per inch) of output image.
inputs.name: DPI

inputs.description: Horizontal dimension of output saved image, in units of inches.
inputs.name: X-Length

inputs.description: Vertical dimension of output saved image, in units of inches.
inputs.name: Y-Length

inputs.description: Use matplotlib's tight_layout() option to ensure no overlap of features in the image.
inputs.name: Tight Layout On

inputs.description: Switch if you don't want matrix figure output.
inputs.name: Figure Off

inputs.description: Set font size for colorbar and title.
inputs.name: Font Size

inputs.description: Set font size for x- and y-axis labels.
inputs.name: Label Font Size

inputs.description: Minimum colorbar value.
inputs.name: Plot Min

inputs.description: Maximum colorbar value.
inputs.name: Plot Max

inputs.description: Switch to not include a colorbar at the right side of the plot.
inputs.name: Colorbar Off

inputs.description: Change the colormap style used in the plot.
inputs.name: Map of Colors

inputs.description: Set the number of intervals on the colorbar.
inputs.name: Colorbar Interval Number

inputs.description: Width of colorbar as percentage of width of the correlation matrix.
inputs.name: Width of Colorbar Percentage

inputs.description: Specify number formatting for the colorbar numbers (e.g., '%.4f' for four decimal places).
inputs.name: Specifier

inputs.description: Switch to turn off labels along the x- (horizontal) axis but leave those along the y- (vertical) axis.
inputs.name: X-axis Label Off
